word_forms.definition_en: a close or loving friendship between two people

examples.example: Marc and Amy have been in a relationship since their first date four years ago.
examples.translate: 自從四年前第一次約會後，Marc和Amy就持續交往中。

examples.example: Maggie has a very close relationship with her grandparents because she lived with them for most of her childhood.
examples.translate: Maggie與祖父母關係非常親密，因為她兒時大部分的時間都和他們住。

examples.example: In relation to your question in the email, I still don’t know the answer.
examples.translate: 關於你在郵件中問我的問題，我現在還沒有答案。

examples.example: There is a relation between the fires and the recent dry weather.
examples.translate: 火災與最近乾燥的天氣有關係。

examples.example: Studies have related smoking to many health problems, so you shouldn’t take up this habit.
examples.translate: 研究認為抽菸與許多健康問題相關，所以你不應該染上這個習慣。

word_forms.definition_en: bringing pleasure to a person by providing something that person wants or needs

examples.example: Billy thinks it is satisfying to drink a big cup of iced tea after he exercises.
examples.translate: Billy覺得運動後喝一大杯冰茶是很滿足的。

examples.example: The hotpot dinner really satisfied all of the hungry guests.
examples.translate: 這頓火鍋晚餐真正滿足了所有飢餓的客人。

examples.example: Jessica smiled with satisfaction when she saw 100 on her test sheet.
examples.translate: 當Jessica看到考卷上的100分時，她滿足地微笑了。

word_forms.definition_en: to cause someone to have the desire, confidence, or enthusiasm to do a good thing or improve himself or herself

examples.example: The superheroine Wonder Woman has inspired a lot of girls with her bravery and strength.
examples.translate: 超級女英雄的神力女超人以其勇氣與力量鼓舞了許多女生。

examples.example: Carly was inspired by one of the paintings in the museum and decided to take an art class.
examples.translate: Carly受到博物館裡一幅畫的啟發，決定要去上美術課。

examples.example: Paulina draws inspiration from her relationships with others when she writes poetry.
examples.translate: Paulina寫詩的時候，靈感來自她與別人的關係。

word_forms.definition_en: to develop a relationship with someone

examples.example: The two friends connected with each other when they rode their bikes around the country together.
examples.translate: 這兩個朋友在一起單車環繞全國旅行時建立了良好關係。

examples.example: Jason connected his smartphone to the TV, so he could show his friends some pictures on the bigger screen.
examples.translate: Jason將他的智慧型手機接到電視，讓他的朋友能在大螢幕上看些照片。

examples.example: The teacher failed to see the connection between Bonnie’s story and her being late for class.
examples.translate: 這位老師看不出Bonnie的說法與她上課遲到之間的關係。

word_forms.definition_en: to share information, facts, ideas, or feelings with others

examples.example: The Internet allows us to communicate quickly and easily with people all over the world.
examples.translate: 網路讓我們快速且輕易地與世界各地的人溝通。

examples.example: Telephone calls have become a less common means of communication as many people now prefer apps like LINE.
examples.translate: 隨著許多人偏好LINE等應用程式，打電話成了較沒那麼普遍的通訊方式。

word_forms.definition_en: to inform or teach someone about something that he or she doesn’t know much about

examples.example: This two-minute video introduces the public to the latest iPhone and its new features.
examples.translate: 這段兩分鐘的影片讓大眾體驗最新型的iPhone及其新的特色。

examples.example: Mr. Cheng introduced Ms. Lee to his wife as his hardest-working employee.
examples.translate: 鄭先生介紹他最勤勞的員工李女士給他太太認識。

examples.example: The waiter gave the guests a detailed introduction to that day’s menu.
examples.translate: 這位服務生給客人詳細介紹當天的菜單。

word_forms.definition_en: occurring during an entire period of time

examples.example: In some countries, like Singapore, the weather stays hot throughout the year.
examples.translate: 某些國家，如新加坡，天氣一整年都很熱。

word_forms.definition_en: a piece of writing such as an email or SMS (short message service) sent to someone electronically

examples.example: Kylie sent a text message to her boss to tell him that she would be ten minutes late for work.
examples.translate: Kylie發了通簡訊給老闆，告訴他她上班會晚十分鐘到。

examples.example: Olivia refreshed her Facebook Feed to check for new posts from her friends.
examples.translate: Olivia更新她臉書的即時動態，看看她朋友們有沒有貼新的消息。

examples.example: This weather webpage refreshes every minute, so the information is always up-to-date.
examples.translate: 這個天氣的網頁每分鐘自動刷新，所以資訊總是即時。

examples.example: Carl refreshed himself with a large glass of ice-cold water.
examples.translate: Carl喝了一大杯冰開水讓自己恢復精神。

word_forms.definition_en: related to love or a couple’s personal relationship

examples.example: Nicole and Sam were just friends for many years and never developed a romantic relationship.
examples.translate: Nicole和Sam多年來都只是朋友，從沒有發展出戀愛關係。

examples.example: Cindy is glad that her love life is much simpler than most romance novels.
examples.translate: Cindy很高興她的愛情生活比大多數愛情小說來得簡單多了。

word_forms.definition_en: to pay particular attention to one thing, situation, or person

examples.example: Jason couldn’t focus on the action in the movie because he was trying to read the words on the screen.
examples.translate: Jason沒辦法專心看電影裡的畫面，因為他在努力地看字幕。

examples.example: Violet needs to look for a quiet place like the library to study, so she can focus her mind on her books.
examples.translate: Violet需要找個像圖書館之類安靜的地方念書，這樣她才能專心在書本上。

examples.example: The main focus for today’s history class will be World Wars I and II.
examples.translate: 今天的歷史課重點將會是第一及第二次世界大戰。

examples.example: Grace totally ignored her younger brother as he made silly faces at her.
examples.translate: 當Grace的弟弟對她做鬼臉時，她完全不理會。

examples.example: Out of ignorance, the students made jokes about the exchange student’s country.
examples.translate: 這些學生出於無知，對這個交換學生的國家開玩笑。

word_forms.definition_en: the act of focusing on something or someone

examples.example: The article draws our attention to the importance of being good parents in today’s world.
examples.translate: 這篇文章讓我們注意到在現今世界當好父母的重要性。

word_forms.definition_en: to refuse to admit that something is true

examples.example: Mr. Lin denied giving a box of candy to his daughter, but Mrs. Lin didn’t believe him.
examples.translate: 林先生否認拿了一盒糖果給女兒，但林太太不相信他。

word_forms.definition_en: to give a spoken or written reply to someone or something

examples.example: Chris responded to his mom’s Facebook message with a smiling cat sticker.
examples.translate: Chris用一個貓咪微笑的貼圖回應他母親的臉書訊息。

examples.example: When Helen’s boss asked her to work late, she responded that she couldn’t because she didn’t feel well.
examples.translate: Helen的老闆要求她加班，她回應說她沒辦法，因為她不太舒服。

examples.example: The students in the class made no response to the teacher’s difficult question.
examples.translate: 對於老師這個困難的問題，班上學生沒有任何答覆。

examples.example: In response to the reporter’s question about her recent marriage, the famous singer only said that she was very happy.
examples.translate: 這位名歌手僅表示她很幸福來回應記者對於她最近結婚的問題。

word_forms.definition_en: sad or upset because something you hoped for has not happened or has not occurred in the way that you expected

examples.example: Fiona was really disappointed that her favorite character died at the end of the movie.
examples.translate: Fiona對於電影中她最喜愛的角色最後死了感到很失望。

word_forms.definition_en: to cause someone to feel disappointed

examples.example: It really disappointed Sally that her friend Lindsay never replied to her message.
examples.translate: Sally的朋友Lindsay從不回她的訊息讓她覺得很失望。

examples.example: To Amy’s great disappointment, her parents were late for the dance show and missed her part.
examples.translate: 讓Amy很失望的是，她的父母親在她舞蹈表演遲到，沒看到她演出的部分。

word_forms.definition_en: in a way that is regarded as hurtful to one’s self

examples.example: Please don’t take my comment personally. I’m complaining about all the drivers in our country, not just you.
examples.translate: 請不要認為我的評語是針對你個人。我是在抱怨整個國家的所有駕駛人，不是只有你。

examples.example: Mrs. Thompson has a lot of personal experience working with kids who can’t focus in class.
examples.translate: Thompson老師有很多和上課無法專心的小孩相處的個人經驗。

word_forms.definition_en: used to emphasize that something is true

examples.example: December is not cold in Australia. In fact, it’s the middle of summer.
examples.translate: 澳洲的十二月不冷；其實，那時澳洲正值仲夏。

word_forms.definition_en: to search through or look at several things one by one

examples.example: Bill is going through the list of winners to see if he is one of them.
examples.translate: Bill正逐一瀏覽得獎者的名單來查看他是否是其中一位。

word_forms.definition_en: done with knowledge of the possibility that something might have happened or will happen

examples.example: Each of the hikers brought an umbrella and a raincoat in case it rained.
examples.translate: 每個健行者都帶了傘和雨衣，以防下雨。

word_forms.definition_en: also

examples.example: Please remember to bring a snack to the party. In addition, you should bring a gift for the birthday boy.
examples.translate: 請記得帶點心來參加派對。此外，你該帶份禮物送給壽星男孩。

word_forms.definition_en: to spend time together in a fun or casual way

examples.example: Alice and her friends always hang out in a café after school on Fridays.
examples.translate: Alice和她的朋友們總是在週五放學後聚在咖啡廳。

word_forms.definition_en: to go to or rely on someone or something for some purpose

examples.example: Tracy always turns to her older sister Ivy when she has a problem with one of her friends.
examples.translate: Tracy跟朋友們中的其中一位相處有問題時，總是向她的姐姐Ivy求助。

word_forms.definition_zh: 認為……是針對個人；對……感到不悅
word_forms.definition_en: to be offended by something

examples.example: Please don’t take this personally, but I don’t like your shirt. You look better in darker colors.
examples.translate: 我沒有針對你，不過我不太喜歡你穿的襯衫。你穿深色比較好看。

word_forms.definition_zh: Instagram（一款提供圖片及視訊分享的社交應用軟體）
LINE（一款即時通訊軟體與行動應用程式）
